heisigStory: The ward referred to here is a subdivision of a large city. Its elements: box . . . sheaves. When used as a primitive element, it may be helpful at times to break it up into these same composite elements.
koohiiStory1: In the homeless ward of the city you see people sleeping in CARDBOARD BOXES using a SHEAF as a pillow.
koohiiStory2: That´s the homeless ward of the city. Wolverine lives in a cardboard box there.
